name: wrdv

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c0, cword(universe)))
-| wss(cword(c1), cword(universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c0, cword(universe)))
-| wss(cword(c1), cword(universe))

body.origin:
|- wss(cword(c1), cword(universe))
-| wss(c1, universe)
-| wi(wss(c1, universe), wss(cword(c1), cword(universe)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Word(c1)⊆ Word(𝕌)
⊣ c1 ⊆ 𝕌
⊣ (c1 ⊆ 𝕌 → Word(c1)⊆ Word(𝕌))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c0, cword(universe)))
-| wss(c1, universe)
-| wi(wss(c1, universe), wss(cword(c1), cword(universe)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Word(c1)→ c0 ∈ Word(𝕌))
⊣ c1 ⊆ 𝕌
⊣ (c1 ⊆ 𝕌 → Word(c1)⊆ Word(𝕌))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c0, cword(universe)))
-| wi(wss(c1, universe), wss(cword(c1), cword(universe)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Word(c1)→ c0 ∈ Word(𝕌))
⊣ (c1 ⊆ 𝕌 → Word(c1)⊆ Word(𝕌))

comment: A word over an alphabet is a word over the universal class. (Contributed by AV, 8-Feb-2021.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 18-Nov-2022.)
